summary: App UI branding updates: place logo in top-left and add a transparent scrolling logo background on logged-in pages.

existing_features.title: Ensure the authenticated app header displays the XOROOTS logo anchored in the top-left of the viewport on all logged-in pages (i.e., wherever <Header /> is rendered), with consistent sizing and spacing so it is visibly top-left (not centered) across breakpoints.

Add a transparent, continuously scrolling background using the XOROOTS logo on authenticated (logged-in) pages only, behind the Dashboard content, without impacting readability or blocking interactions.

Use the user-provided XOROOTS logo asset(s) for the header logo and the authenticated scrolling background (preferably via the centralized BRANDING.logo.src reference) and keep delivery as static frontend assets (no backend proxying).

new_feature_requests.summary: Place the user's logo in the top-left of the app UI.
Add the user's logo as a transparent scrolling background on logged-in pages.

projectName: Place XOROOTS logo in top-left and add transparent scrolling logo background on authenticated pages
